00248     // where we can check
00249     $form=FormAchView($cn,$p_jrn,$User->GetPeriode(),$_POST,$submit,$nb_number);
00250   } else {
00251     // if something goes wrong, correct it
00252     $submit='<INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" NAME="add_item" VALUE="Ajout article">
00253                     <INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" NAME="view_invoice" VALUE="Sauver">';
